officialTitle: MOBILE Trial. Mechanical and Oral Antibiotic Bowel Preparation Versus no Bowel preparatIon for eLEctive Colectomy - a Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Controlled Trial.
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients undergoing colon resection
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 95 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Emergency surgery needed
* Bowel obstruction
* Colonoscopy scheduled to be undertaken peroperatively
* Other reason indicating mechanical preparation or contradicting it
* Allergy to used drugs (PEG, neomycin, metronidazole)
